extractionParameters.IGNORE_TABLES: mars-event%.%, mars-etl-%.%, mars-bpm%.%, mars-rules.%, mars-blats1-camunda%.%, mars-tm-config.%, mars-%.AUDIT_LOG, mars-%.GRID, mars-%.GRID_COLUMNS, mars-%.GRID_COLUMN_PROPERTIES, mars-%.UI_PERMISSIONS, mars-%.PROJECT_CONFIGURATIONS, mars-%.CASELOADER_PAYLOAD, mars-%.PORTFOLIO, mars-%.PRIVACY_NOTICE, mars-%.USER_SECURITY, mars-%.flyway_schema_history, mars-consumer-%.CONSUMER_AUTHENTICATION, mars-%.%BKP% ,mars-%.%_TEMP_%, mars-%.%_TEMP, mars-%.shedlock

compareParameters.CP_TABLE_LIST_QUERY: SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME, STR_TO_DATE(date_format(current_timestamp(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS LOG_CREATED_ON, coalesce(has_created_on_col, 0) as HAS_CREATED_ON_COL FROM information_schema.TABLES t left outer join (SELECT table_name as table_col, case when count(*) > 0 then '1' else '0' end as has_created_on_col FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE UPPER(COLUMN_NAME) = 'CREATED_ON' group by table_name) c on t.table_name = c.table_col where (TABLE_SCHEMA like 'mars-task-template%' or TABLE_SCHEMA like 'mars-ecms-definition%' or TABLE_SCHEMA like 'mars-tenant-manager%') and TABLE_SCHEMA not like 'mars-blats1-camunda%' and TABLE_NAME not like 'AUDIT_LOG' and TABLE_NAME not like 'GRID' and TABLE_NAME not like 'GRID_COLUMNS' and TABLE_NAME not like 'GRID_COLUMN_PROPERTIES' and TABLE_NAME not like 'UI_PERMISSIONS' and TABLE_NAME not like 'PORTFOLIO' and TABLE_NAME not like 'PRIVACY_NOTICE' and TABLE_NAME not like 'flyway_schema_history' and TABLE_NAME not like 'USER_SECURITY' and TABLE_NAME not like 'shedlock' and concat(TABLE_SCHEMA,TABLE_NAME) not like 'mars-consumer-%CONSUMER_AUTHENTICATION' and concat(TABLE_SCHEMA,TABLE_NAME) not like '%task%EXTERNAL_REQ_RESPONSE' and TABLE_NAME not like 'ENUM_DUMMY' and TABLE_NAME not like 'ENUM_DISENROLLMENT_REASON' and TABLE_NAME not like 'ENUM_CONTRACT_STATUS' and TABLE_NAME not like 'ENUM_APPLICATION_SOURCE' and TABLE_NAME not like 'DISPLAY_MAPPING' and TABLE_NAME not like 'CONDITIONAL_DISPLAY' and TABLE_NAME not like '%_TEMP_%' and TABLE_NAME not like 'TEMPLATE_DATA_API' and TABLE_NAME not like 'PROJECT_CONFIGURATIONS' and TABLE_NAME not like 'PRODUCT' and TABLE_NAME not like 'INBOUND_FILE_DETAILS' and TABLE_NAME not like 'HIBERNATE_SEQUENCE' and TABLE_NAME not like 'FIELD_VALIDATION' and TABLE_NAME not like 'CORRESPONDENCE_DEFINITION_HISTORY' and TABLE_NAME not like 'CHANNEL_DEFINITION_ELEMENTS' and TABLE_NAME not like 'APIGEE_ERROR_LOG' and TABLE_NAME not like 'ENUM_ESCALATION_REASON' and TABLE_NAME not like 'USER_ENDPOINTS_VIEW' and TABLE_NAME not like 'UI_PERMISSIONS_TO_BE_DEL_0901' -- and table_rows > 0 order by 2 desc;
